abstract: After five years, this is the final post on You’re the Boss. As a parting gift, we offer some highlights from another year spent in the trenches, where we all continued to make mistakes and learn lessons.
snippet: After five years, this is the final post on You’re the Boss. As a parting gift, we offer some highlights from another year spent in the trenches, where we all continued to make mistakes and learn lessons.
lead_paragraph: For the past five years, it’s been my pleasure to edit the You’re the Boss small-business blog, which has afforded me the opportunity to work with a talented array of journalists and business owners. The journalists covered their beats diligently, the owners shared their ups and downs generously, and we all benefited from the comments offered by an exceedingly smart group of readers.

headline.main: So Long, From You’re the Boss
